trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Expõe <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"> </xref> tipos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: GenericRootAutomationPeer is used as a peer for <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> when it contains the following tree: ![HwndSource->Visual->2 UIElement objects](~/add/media/apgenericroot.png "HwndSource->Visual->2 UIElement objects") Because only <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types have peers, and visuals are not <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types, a common parent does not exist in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types.
trans-unit.target: GenericRootAutomationPeer é usado como um par de <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>quando ela contém a seguinte árvore: ![HwndSource - > Visual - >&2; objetos UIElement](~/add/media/apgenericroot.png "HwndSource-> Visual->&2; objetos UIElement") porque somente <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>tipos têm pares e visuais não são <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>tipos, um pai comum não existe no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] de árvore para o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>tipos.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] expects a single root peer from the application; therefore, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)] creates a GenericRootAutomationPeer for the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> in order to serve as a single root peer to parent peers for the two <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]espera um par de raiz única de aplicativo. Portanto, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)] cria um GenericRootAutomationPeer para o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>para servir como um par de raiz única de pares de pai para os dois <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>tipos.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the root peer is a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o par de raiz é <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref> valor de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that represents the bounding rectangle of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> que representa o retângulo delimitador do <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo delimitador.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "Pane".
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém "Painel".

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o rótulo de texto a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>

trans-unit.source: You can think of the name property as if it were a string of text that users use to explain the control they are referring to.
trans-unit.target: Você pode pensar a propriedade name como se fosse uma cadeia de caracteres de texto que os usuários usam para explicar o controle está referenciando.

trans-unit.source: Make certain that you have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que você tenha uma representação textual para todos os controles de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] para que você pode consultar programaticamente o controle de maneira localizada.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the label.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres que contém o rótulo.
